case_summary: Patient admitted for evaluation of amenorrhea. Initial workup to include hormonal assays, pelvic ultrasound, and specialist consultation to determine underlying etiology. Focus on identifying primary or secondary causes.
recommended_care_plan: Comprehensive diagnostic workup including hormonal panel (FSH, LH, Prolactin, TSH, Estradiol), pelvic ultrasound, and gynecological consultation. Depending on findings, further imaging (MRI) or genetic testing may be required. Patient education on lifestyle factors.
expected_length_of_stay: Outpatient (diagnostic visit) or 1 day (if inpatient for rapid workup)

required_procedures.description: Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of a new patient

discharge_planning_notes: Ensure follow-up appointment with Gynaecologist is scheduled. Provide patient education on potential causes and importance of adherence to diagnostic plan. Monitor for results of initial tests.
